name: North Calotte Council
memberOrga: Regional Council of Lapland, Lapland Center of Business, Environment, and Transport, Lapland Chamber of Commerce, Rovaniemi municipality, County Administrative Board of Norrbotten, Norrbotten County Council, Association of municipalities and regions in Norrbotten, Norrbotten Chamber of Commerce, Nordland County Council, Nordland County Governor, Troms County Council, Troms County Governor, Finnmark County Council, Finnmark County Governor, Innovation Norway.
goal: Promote and develop regional cross-border cooperation between the northernmost counties of Finland, Sweden, and Norway.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Borders and Security, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Culture, Digital economy and society, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, European Neighbourhood Policy, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives: EU Arctic communication; Territorial Cohesion Policy 2020-2027; Smart specialization platforms
